attributes.action: take action to clear the rubbish on the m11 motorway particularly at the entrance to the olympic site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I unfortunatly had to travel by bus from Ingatestone to Liverpool Street station(due to rail workings) and was shocked by the amount of litter strewn on the motorway edges along this route. What a first view for the planned visitors to our olympic site.
Who is responsible for clearing this rubbish and who will take action to ensure it is done?

rejection.details: We suggest you contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
